The West Coast is lighting up today with 3 ft @9s WNW swell and light 10 mph SSW winds. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your top picks, both offering fun conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell builds slightly to 4 ft @10s with light 3 mph NNE winds, keeping it clean and enjoyable. Day after, expect 5 ft @12s with a fresh 14 mph ESE wind, making it a bit choppy but still surfable at sheltered spots. Best: tomorrow.
